result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven Scott Miller was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver THC (<=200g), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(h)1.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $518.00   Pay obligation within 60 days or apply to the Clerk of Court for a payment plan within 60 days and pay the $15.00 payment plan fee.

6 months county jail - this can be served at any other county in the State of WI if no additional expense to Sawyer County.  The first 48 hours must be spent in Sawyer County; beginning July 31, 2015 at 3:00 pm.
DE pleads G to Amended Ct. 1; court finds guilty and convicts on Amended Ct. 1; Ct. 2 & 3 are dismissed and read-in and "Ct." 4  consolidated VERNON County Case 14CF54 dismissed and read in with this agreement.

judgments.dispoDesc: DE pleads G to Amended Ct. 1; court finds guilty and convicts on Amended Ct. 1; Ct. 2 & 3 are dismissed and read-in and "Ct." 4  consolidated Vernon County Case 14CF54 dismissed and read in with this agreement.

on left side of file - Defendant's Application for Consolidation; Plaintiff's Consent to Consolidation; Criminal Complaint case #14CF54 VERNON County; 
Fax from Attorney John Matousek- letter regarding Steven Miller

Defendant Steven Scott Miller in court with attorney John M. Matousek.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Resolved without trial.  State motions to amend  Ct. 1 to Felony I and file amended information; court grants motion;  defendant ack receipt of amended information; advised of rights; joint recommendation; parties stipulate to facts; plea questionnaire filed; DE pleads G to Amended Ct. 1; court finds guilty and convicts on Amended Ct. 1; Ct. 2 & 3 are dismissed and read-in and "Ct." 4  consolidated Vernon County Case 14CF54 dismissed and read in with this agreement.  PSI is waived; Sentence 6 months County jail - can be served at any other county in the State of WI if no additional expense to Sawyer County, the first 48 hours must be in Sawyer County beginning July 31, 2015 3:00 pm w/huber;  6 days credit for time served; court costs and surcharges totaling $518.00; DNA sample & surcharge; advised of appeal rights.
Defendant Steven Scott Miller in court with attorney John M. Matousek.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Off record no special instructions.
